idea-plugin.name: VectorPathTweaker
idea-plugin.description:
Too lazy to become an artist who do paintings? Let's make combinations of android's default vector assets!
Flip, transpose, and translate the icons, you will never find it so easy!
  • 1. Open one xml vector drawable.
  • 2. Select the part of pathData where you wants to modify.
  • 3. Right click. In the context menu select 'Tweak Vector Path'.
  • 4. Make sure you have the same viewport size in the tweaker dialog .
  • 5. Open AndroidStudio's Preview Panel and adjust the vector to your needÔºÅ.
